instance.name: Commerce Layer Client ID
instance.description: The Client ID of your Contentful application on Commerce Layer. Visit the setttings area on your Commerce Layer store to manage your organization's applications and generate the credentials for Contentful.

instance.name: Commerce Layer Client secret
instance.description: The Client secret of your Contentful application on Commerce Layer. Visit the setttings area on your Commerce Layer store to manage your organization's applications and generate the credentials for Contentful.

instance.name: Commerce Layer Endpoint
instance.description: The Endpoint of your organization on Commerce Layer.
